title: Favourite DJ Sona theme?
body:
Just wondering what everybody's favourite theme for DJ Sona is
I like Kinetic
Etheral is the prettiest, but the music is too calm for a league match imho

replies.body:
I use Ethereal for laning phase, then drop the beat. 

I love concussive, personally! :D
Ethereal for laning, either of the other two for laying the smacketh down. Don't really have a favorite.
Concussion is by far my favorite. The music is killer.
